location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Lieutenant Richard Bennett, Commander of the Alert

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, directs Lieutenant Richard Bennett, Commander of the Alert, to proceed to the Island of Carack, in order to collect passengers before returning to Bushire. Bennett is instructed to provide himself with a pilot for the Bussora [Basra] river so that he will not have any occasion to stop there on his way to Bussora.
